name: Baserow
description:
Baserow is an open source no-code database tool and Airtable alternative. Easily create
a relational database without any technical expertise. Build a table and define custom
fields like text, number, file and many more. More information about persistent files on S3, scaling and installing a custom domain can be found on https://baserow.io/docs/guides/installation/install-on-heroku. Note that it might take a couple of minutes to deploy the app, so please be patient.

SECRET_KEY.description: A unique string that is used to generate secrets.

BASEROW_JWT_SIGNING_KEY.description: A unique string that is used to sign jwt tokens.

BASEROW_PUBLIC_URL.description: The public URL of your Heroku Baserow app. Don't forget to replace YOUR_APP_NAME with the name of your app.

BASEROW_AMOUNT_OF_WORKERS.description: The amount of workers per dyno. This value must be `1` if you want to run the free plan.
